Text.Value: Follow Chionthar... but beware... danger ahead... darkness...
Secret tunnel... entrance hidden... Selûne temple...
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
Moonrise Towers? How do I get there?
What can you tell me about ceremorphosis?
Someone controls the parasites... controls the cultists...
Curse... made of shadow... all succumb to it... find another way...

EditorData.logicalname: DOESN'T KNOW ANSWER - DELETE IF NOT NEEDED

Text.Value: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

Synopsis: Speak with Dead dialogue with First Druid Halsin, in the event that he's killed. He delivers some important - but cryptic - hints about what we'll have to do next in the search for a cure.
